item.title: 欧洲股市在贸易和政治忧虑中勉强实现年内涨幅
item.description: 英国和法国的股票市场在清淡的交易中下跌，导致欧洲基准以微弱的涨幅结束了 2024 年。【原文：Equity markets in the UK and France fell in thin trading, leading the European benchmark to wrap up 2024 with modest gains.】

item.title: 尽管第三季度法郎反弹，但瑞士央行仍远离外汇市场
item.description: 尽管地缘政治动荡引发了瑞士法郎的反弹，但瑞士国家银行在第三季度仍然没有对瑞士法郎施加重大影响。【原文：The Swiss National Bank continued to refrain from significantly influencing the franc in the third quarter, even as the currency saw a rally triggered by geopolitical turmoil.】

item.title: 据说 Mobvista 正在考虑出售 Mintegral 部门，贝恩对此很感兴趣
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，在收到包括美国私募股权公司贝恩资本在内的潜在买家的兴趣后，Mobvista 公司正在探索出售其移动广告平台 Mintegral。【原文：Mobvista Inc. is exploring a sale of its mobile advertising platform Mintegral after receiving interest from prospective buyers including US private equity firm Bain Capital, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 摩根大通韩国高级银行家在转向芯片和人工智能时离职
item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）在韩国的高级银行家曾帮助三星电子公司（Samsung Electronics Co.【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s top banker in South Korea, who helped devise landmark deals for domestic leaders such as Samsung Electronics Co., is retiring while the US bank focuses on backing clients’ bets on chips and AI.】

item.title: 肯尼亚 12 月通胀因食品成本上涨而加速
item.description: 由于食品和运输成本上涨，肯尼亚 12 月份的年通货膨胀率连续第二个月攀升。【原文：Kenya’s annual inflation rate climbed for a second successive month in December as food and transport costs increased.】

item.title: 台湾延长期满前最后一天的日间交易减税政策
item.description: 在日间交易减税措施到期前的最后一次会议上，台湾立法者同意将其再延长三年。【原文：Taiwan lawmakers agreed to extend a tax cut for day trading for another three years on the last session before the measure was set to expire.】

item.title: 中国提高政府工作人员工资以增加支出
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国已为全国一系列公务员进行了多年来的首次大幅加薪，以鼓舞士气、刺激消费。【原文：China has awarded a range of civil servants across the nation their first significant pay rise in years, according to people familiar with the matter, as policymakers try to boost morale and spur spending.】

item.title: 习近平称中国 2024 年 GDP 增长将达到 5%左右的目标
item.description: 中国国家主席习近平表示，预计 2024 年全年中国国内生产总值将增长 5%左右，这标志着世界第二大经济体有望实现其官方目标。【原文：China’s gross domestic product is expected to expand around 5% for the full year of 2024, President Xi Jinping said, signaling the world’s second-largest economy is on track to meet its official target.】

item.title: IAG 和 NatWest 在 2024 年英国股市赢家中脱颖而出
item.description: 由于长途旅行需求激增，英国航空公司（British Airways）所有者 IAG SA 和劳斯莱斯控股公司（Rolls-Royce Holdings Plc）的股票在 2024 年强劲反弹，成为表现最好的英国股票之一。【原文：Shares in British Airways-owner IAG SA and Rolls-Royce Holdings Plc rallied powerfully in 2024 to be among the best-performing UK stocks as long-haul travel demand surged.】

item.title: 奇瑞加入摩根大通，10 亿美元在香港上市
item.description: 据知情人士透露，奇瑞控股集团有限公司已邀请摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Chery Holding Group Co. has added JPMorgan Chase & Co. to help arrange a potential listing of its automotive unit in Hong Kong next year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 增长势头强劲，巴基斯坦股市创 2002 年以来最佳涨幅
item.description: 巴基斯坦股市有望创下 22 年来最大的年度涨幅，其表现几乎优于全球所有市场，因为经济状况有所改善，交易商押注会有更多降息举措。【原文：Pakistani stocks are on pace to record their biggest annual gain in 22 years, outperforming nearly all markets worldwide as economic conditions improve and traders bet on more interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 俄罗斯石油进口放缓，印度炼油厂增加中东石油进口
item.description: 印度最大的炼油商之一被迫从中东寻求价格更高的替代原油货源，以弥补俄罗斯供应量的减少，这使得贸易商关注 2025 年全球市场前景的同时，出口模式的转变成为焦点。【原文：One of India’s largest refiners has been forced to seek alternative and more expensive crude cargoes from the Middle East to make up for lower supplies from Russia, putting a spotlight on shifting export patterns as traders focus on the global market’s prospects in 2025.】

item.title: 印度尝试首次太空对接，希望加入精英俱乐部
item.description: 印度将两颗小型卫星送入轨道，进行首次太空对接实验，这是印度向实现建立自己的空间站和执行载人登月任务的雄心迈出的关键一步。【原文：India put into orbit two small satellites for its first space docking experiment, a key step toward meeting the country’s ambitions to build its own space station and carry out a manned mission to the moon.】

item.title: 香港亿万富豪郑氏家族寻求以 20 亿美元出售中国收费公路
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，香港亿万富豪郑氏家族的基础设施部门正在寻求出售中国大陆的一批公路，价值约 20 亿美元。【原文：The infrastructure arm of Hong Kong’s billionaire Cheng family is seeking to sell a bundle of roads in mainland China worth about $2 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 旧矿山和垃圾场推动泛非股价飙升 90
item.description: 今年表现最好的南非矿业公司正在挑战该国黄金生产成本越来越高、品位越来越低的当代声誉。【原文：The best-performing South African miner this year is defying the country’s contemporary reputation for ever-more costly and lower-grade gold production.】

item.title: 数据显示，液化天然气出口增速为 2015 年以来最慢
item.description: 全球液化天然气出口量的增长速度是 2015 年以来最慢的，在新的供应量上线以满足不断增长的需求之前，液化天然气价格有可能持续走高。【原文：Global liquefied natural gas exports grew at the slowest pace since 2015, threatening to keep prices elevated until new supply comes online to meet rising demand.】

item.title: 受中国经济放缓影响，铁矿石将出现 2015 年以来最严重的年度跌幅
item.description: 在中国的房地产危机损害了需求，而矿商提高了货运量之后，铁矿石创下了自2015年以来最严重的年度亏损，价格也未能从显示第一大进口国出现复苏迹象的数据中得到提振。【原文：Iron ore headed for its deepest annual loss since 2015 after China’s property crisis hurt demand and miners boosted cargoes, with prices failing to get a lift from data showing signs of recovery in the top importer.】

item.title: 香港在 2024 年最后一个交易日迎来 IPO 申请高峰
item.description: 多家公司宣布计划在未来一个月内在香港上市，进一步表明香港的首次公开募股市场正在复苏。【原文：A slew of companies have announced plans to list shares in Hong Kong over the next month in a further sign the city’s IPO market is reviving.】

item.title: 印度中央银行再次提示小额信贷风险
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 中国股市自大流行病以来首次实现年度上涨
item.description: 中国股市正逼近自大流行病以来的首次年度上涨，如果中国政府进一步支持经济增长，中国股市可能会有更多涨幅。【原文：Chinese stocks are closing in on their first annual advance since the pandemic, and more gains could be in store if Beijing offers further growth support.】

item.title: 澳大利亚股市将在 12 月份成为亚洲表现最差的股市
item.description: 受央行降息时间表的不确定性和中国经济复苏乏力的影响，澳大利亚的股票基准有望成为本月亚太地区表现最差的股票。【原文：Australia’s stock benchmark is on track to become the biggest laggard among Asia Pacific peers this month, weighed by uncertainty around the central bank’s timeline for rate cuts and China’s subdued recovery.】

item.title: 香港政府就法院关于高尔夫球场房屋的裁决提出上诉
item.description: 香港政府正在对法院的一项裁决提起上诉，该裁决阻止了在一个专属高尔夫球场的一部分上建造公共住房的计划。【原文：The Hong Kong government is appealing a court ruling that halted construction plans of public housing on a portion of an exclusive golf course.】

item.title: 经济企稳，中国工厂活动再度扩张
item.description: 中国的工厂活动在 12 月份连续第三个月出现扩张，这增强了人们对中国经济在北京经济刺激计划之后将实现年度增长目标的预期。【原文：China’s factory activity expanded for a third straight month in December, bolstering expectations the economy will reach its annual growth target after Beijing’s stimulus blitz.】

item.title: 2025 年英国消费者将节省生活必需品，大肆举办活动
item.description: 周二的一项研究显示，2024 年英国信用卡和借记卡支出几乎没有增长，因为谨慎的消费者在购买小件奢侈品、听音乐会和旅游的同时减少了食品和大件商品的购买，这为工党政府的增长雄心提供了一个警示信号。【原文：UK credit and debit card spending barely grew in 2024 as cautious consumers treated themselves to small luxuries, concerts and travel while cutting back on food and big-ticket purchases, according to research Tuesday that provides a warning sign for the Labour government’s growth ambitions.】

item.title: 展望 2025 年，石油市场将出现轻微年度亏损
item.description: 在窄幅震荡数月之后，石油市场面临着未来一年动荡不安的前景，全年将出现小幅亏损。【原文：Oil headed for a small annual loss after months locked in a narrow trading range, with the market facing the prospect of a turbulent year ahead.】

item.title: 政治风波蔓延，韩国通胀率上升
item.description: 由于政治动荡对本币造成压力，韩国的消费通胀速度加快，威胁到这个严重依赖进口食品和能源的国家的物价稳定。【原文：South Korea’s consumer inflation gained pace as political turmoil weighs on the local currency, threatening price stability in a country heavily reliant on imports for food and energy.】

item.title: 融资成本创新高，港元创 2021 年以来最强势
item.description: 由于年底需求激增，港元短期借贷成本创下历史新高，港元汇率攀升至三年半以来的最强水平。【原文：The Hong Kong dollar climbed to its strongest level in three and a half years, thanks to a year-end surge in demand that pushed the currency’s short-term borrowing costs to a record high.】

item.title: 华尔街股市下跌，亚洲股市开盘疲软：市场综述
item.description: 在华尔街股市因科技行业疲软而连续第三天扩大跌幅之后，亚洲股市有望低开。【原文：Asian shares are poised to open lower, after stocks extended losses for a third day on Wall Street due to weakness in the tech sector.】

item.title: 投资者关注 2025 年风险，石油看涨押注创四个月新高
item.description: 在 2024 年倒数第二周，看涨石油的押注达到了四个月来的最高点，因为投资者为唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫的新一年做好了准备。【原文：Bullish oil bets reached a four-month high in the penultimate week of 2024 as investors position for a new year that will see Donald Trump’s return to the White House.】

item.title: Big Lots 的新拯救协议因债权人反对而岌岌可危
item.description: 在一些债权人提出抱怨后，一项防止 Big Lots 公司关闭其所有门店的新提案面临风险，这些债权人将在这家陷入困境的零售商破产时蒙受损失。【原文：A new proposal to prevent Big Lots Inc. from shutting all its stores is at risk following complaints from some creditors that stand to incur losses in the troubled retailer’s bankruptcy.】
